text: muham'mad allah yokka sandesaharudu. Mariyu atani venta unnavaru, satyatiraskarula patla kathinulu mariyu parasparam karunamayulu. Nivu varini (allah mundu) vangutu (ruku'u cestu), sastangalu (sajdalu) cestu undatam custunnavu. Varu allah anugrahanni mariyu prasannatanu arthistu untaru. Vari mukhala mida sastangam (sajda) ceyatam valla vaccina gurtuluntayi. Vari i upamanam taurat lo kuda ivvabadutundi. Mariyu injil lo varu oka pairuto polcabaddaru: Modata (bijam nundi) oka molaka ankuristundi, taruvata danini lavuga cestadu. A taruvata adi tana kandam mida nitaruga nilabadi raitulanu ananda parici satyatiraskarulaku krodhavesalu kaligistundi. Visvasinci, satkaryalu cese variki ksamapana mariyu goppa pratiphalanni prasadistanani allah vagdanam cesadu
